original_title: Rich Mullins: Pursuit of a Legacy
overview: The "Pursuit of a Legacy" video was released soon after the album, A Liturgy, A Legacy, and A Ragamuffin Band, and contains five selections from the album. The spoken monologues between the music videos are typical of the "Rich-isms" he often tells at concerts and are all presented in informal settings as Rich simply chats and speaks his mind while the film rolls.
title: Rich Mullins: Pursuit of a Legacy
